title: STAGE Seminar - Events Calendar
snippet: Speaker: Zifan Wang (MIT) Title: Moduli space of abelian varieties II Sections 2.4.-2.6 of Genestier and Ngo, Lectures on Shimura varieties. We will finish the proof that the functor 𝒜 is represented by a smooth quasiprojective scheme. Then, we review Grothendieck and Messing's theorem on deformations of abelian schemes. Finally, we will give an adelic description of 𝒜 and define Hecke ...

title: La Maison Française - MIT
snippet: Zifan Wang. I'm an innocent frosh possibly majoring in pure math. I like metabolizing, destabilizing, photosynthesizing, immaterializing and splenectomizing in my free time. I also play the guitar and consume various kinds of media. For work-related inquiries, contact me at atticusw at mit dot edu.

title: Zifan Wang - Google Sites
snippet: Klas Leino, Zifan Wang, Matt Fredrikson. TL;DR We design a new type of neural network, GloRo Nets, which predicts the most likely class of the input and simultaneously certifies if the prediction is robust for any input perturbation in a pre-defined L2-norm ball. Our certification is based on the global Lipschitz constant of the network and the ...
